assignments.label: Copy 1 of Task For Inside_Central User

value.stringValue: Update sell pricing based on final purchase price

assignments.label: Copy 1 of Task For Office Manager

value.stringValue: Brokerage Opportunity won, pay the seller.

assignments.name: Copy_1_of_Task_For_Office_Manager2
assignments.label: Copy 1 of Task For Office Manager2

value.stringValue: Determine if/when the machine needs to moved, or how long it can be stored at current location.
Check opp to see if ADVERTISED. Send Advertised email

assignments.label: Copy 1 of Task For VA User

assignments.name: Copy_2_of_Task_For_Office_Manager2
assignments.label: Copy 2 of Task For Office Manager2

value.stringValue: Update Zadoon's final purchase price to purchase amount (see wire).

assignments.name: Copy_3_of_Task_For_Office_Manager2
assignments.label: Copy 3 of Task For Office Manager2

value.stringValue: Obtain a full set of marketing photos and videos
Unlist unit from all forms of marketing.

assignments.name: Create_New_Task_For_Opportunity_Owner
assignments.label: Create New Task For Opportunity Owner

value.stringValue: Send buyer agreement via HelloSign. Create tasks to follow up if no response. Update Buyer Agreement Status field to "Sent"; change to "Completed" once signed. Leave task open until signature completed.

assignments.name: Create_New_Task_For_Opportunity_Unit_Owner
assignments.label: Create New Task For Opportunity Unit Owner

value.stringValue: Send buyer agreement via HelloSign. Create tasks to follow up if no response. Update Buyer Agreement Status field to "Sent"; change to "Completed" once signed. Leave task open until signature completed.
Send matching email. This unit is in proactive brokerage; keep an eye out for Mailchimp responses.Email
Post this unit on FB groups (at least 20)
Post this Unit on Iron Connect sites
Set competitive sell pricing based on comparable MT units.
"Wire should be coming in for $" + TEXT({!$Record.Total_Cost__c}) + ". Once received, move opp to delivering (if we are doing freight) or closed won stage"
Confirm wire info by phone and add to BOS. Incl year, make, model, S/N and ZID in the payment details of wire. @Post Hardy when completed.
Coordinate Inspection; update inspection section including inspection status on Opp.
Update Unit Details and unit stora address on Unit record.
Send copy of signed pro forma to buyer.
Follow up with seller to see if there has been progress.
Update sell pricing based on seller's most recent bottom price, make it extra competitive.
Follow up on this proactive brokerage opp - any hits/offers? did seller sell it?

Inspection is being schedule. 1) Speak with the inspector; 2) ensure they get appropriate pics/vids; 3) get a build sheet/service history (if dealer); and 4) ensure completed inspection report and ECU (Matris/etc.) are completed.
Review inspection report with at least one other teammate, update confidential info notes once completed.
Get seller invoice with "free and clear of liens/encumbrances" verbiage and wire info
Ensure Unit Details are completed and ask for additional pictures if there are not many
Update Site Contact and address info on unit page.

assignments.name: Task_For_Unit_Owner_to_add_inspection_report
assignments.label: Task For Unit Owner to add inspection report

value.stringValue: Opp lost, let seller know no deal, or let the unit owner know to inform the seller.
Unlist unit from all forms of marketing.

assignments.name: Task_For_VA_to_add_inspection_report
assignments.label: Task For VA to add inspection report

value.stringValue: Add inspection report to Google Drive and create link on Unit Page field called "Inspection Report - Google Drive Link"

assignments.name: Task_For_VA_to_market_on_iron_connect
assignments.label: Task For VA to market on iron connect

value.stringValue: List this unit on iron connect
